entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SuperPMI: Improve superpmi-diffs summarization #80719
    Future
  • SuperPMI: Improve superpmi-diffs pipeline parallelism: split asmdiffs and tpdiff #80718
    Future
  • 1 XOR 1 computes to 1 in release mode #80711
    8.0.0
  • Regression: "The path must be absolute." on Debian Linux #80710
  • Http/SSl StressTest build failures #80706
    8.0.0
  • Json generator should hoist property values in serialization fast-path when ignore condition on write is set #80703
  • XML deserialize self closing raw element #80699
  • Deadlock when recursive resolving scoped services from another Thread #80697
  • System.InvalidOperationException: 'Cannot read keys when either application does not have a console or when console input has been redirected. Try Console.Read. #80695
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'op1->gtEffectiveVal() == base' in `gtMarkAddrMode` when runing aspnet collections with JitStress=2 #80690
    8.0.0
  • [iOS][globalization][icu] Tracking issue for HybridGlobalization: Native API + ICU #80689
  • Workaround for providing support for ConcurrentBag types #80688
  • [QUIC] Bidirectional stream cannot start with receiving #80687
    Future
  • System.TypeInitializationException: PosixSignalRegistration at Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostingAbstractionsHostExtensions.Run(IHost host) #80686
  • No-op EventListener + idle Web app = 190 MB/h native memory leak #80684
  • Segfault when attaching profiler #80683
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport.cmd #80680
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror.sh #80679

Closed

  • NativeAOT RC2 crash with GVMs on linux-x64 #77070
    8.0.0
  • SslStream.ReadAsyncInternal() throws misleading exception if stream is disposed while reading #78586
    8.0.0
  • Regression from Propagate only BBF_COPY_PROPAGATE PR #78040
    8.0.0
  • Alpine 3.17 images causes SSL Error "unsafe legacy renegotiation disabled" #80641
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'GetLayout()->GetClassHandle() != NO_CLASS_HANDLE' during 'Morph - Global' #80616
  • The type initializer for 'System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser' threw an exception #80672
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardInput.WriteLine does not work properly on macOS. #80648
  • zsh comes up on macOS even though System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.CreateNoWindow is specified as true. #80649
  • Memory access out of bounds #41455
    Future
  • Nested StreamWriter disposure #80606
  • Failed to start platform. Reason: TypeError: stackSave is not a function #41942
    Future
  • DynamicObject: Is it possible to customize null propagation operator behavior for dynamic object? #61401
    Future
  • Issue in ECDsaCertificateExtensions.CopyWithPrivateKey with TPM #75971
    8.0.0
  • Performance profiler support and memory dump diagnostics for WebAssembly #61797
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Add a IJsonSerializerOptionsFactory interface. #79939
    Future
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.ValueTuple, Version=4.0.2.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' or one of its dependencies #27533
    Future
  • QUIC and HTTP/3 tests should log which exact version of msquic they use #75596
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • add unsupported attributes to System.Net.Security #80717
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix overwriting of superpmi log file #80716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add the DbgDisablePagemapUse environment variable to control pagemap usage #80714
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix HttpStress & SslStress #80713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Solve recently introduce ASCII regression #80709
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [release/7.0] Fix multiple dumps from being generated #80708
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [browser] symbolicate to avoid undefined stack #80707
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Don't try to fold ADD(CNS, CNS-handle) in gtWalkOp #80704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80702
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80701
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Add 16 byte default alignment to interp frames #80700
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext to have combine semantics. #80698
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT fixes around data flow analysis #80694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #80693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix parsing the output of ping on Samsung phones #80692
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Add a stress mode that poisons implicit byrefs #80691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Optimize the layout of the extra_method_table. #80682
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Make it possible to construct StackFrame without MethodBase #80681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Sync ILLink #80678
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Generate fewer templates for generic virtual methods #80600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add type loader support for resolving static virtuals #80601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor lookupNamedIntrinsic to avoid common duplicate checks #80705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Normalize RepoRoot path to improve logs readability #80664
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80423
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • JIT: Fix implicit byref block expansion #80659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for exercising certificates with platform provider keys #80558
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Cleanup some unused functions/headers #80618
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Rename System.Text.Json test exclusion #80676
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [QUIC] Log msquic version and commit hash to event log and to test output. #80612
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make reading custom attributes in NativeLibrary avoidable #80677
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [browser] improve default initial memory size #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid unobserved ReadAheadTask exceptions in HttpConnection #80214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add statically linked libnuma support for AOT #80671
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Remove usage of ComPlus_ variables in tests #78377
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Disable test which is getting stuck #80658
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Ldp stp modifications flag #80614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold `static readonly VectorX` to GT_CNS_VEC #80670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] enable closure compiler for dotnet.js #80178
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Check return type compatibility for method GDVs #80228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix fuzzers for .NET 8 SDK publish #80673
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] debugger tests- Misc improvements #80660
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use SetupProperties to set properties related to NativeAOT and remove the top-level defaults #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • JIT: maintain pred lists during loop unrolling #80625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
